title: Broken Music
medium: Multiple of melted record, cassette, and texts in box
dimensions: melted record: 6 3/8" (16.2 cm) irreg.; cassette case: 2 1/2 x 3 15/16 x 1/2" (6.4 x 10 x 1.3 cm); cassette: 2 3/4 x 4 1/4 x 13/16" (7 x 10.8 x 2.1 cm) irreg.; texts (each): 7 1/4 x 7 5/8" (18.4 x 19.4 cm); box: 10 11/16 x 8 1/4 x 7/8" (27.1 x 21 x 2.2 cm)
credits: Acquired through the generosity of Lee and Ann Fensterstock in honor of their daughter Jane
